(Sorry if my e-mails are misspelled, my left wrist is strangely hurting 
badly, the only thing I can think of the cause is arm wrestling with a 
friend, and typing certain keys hurts pretty bad)



Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:




Double Punch deactivated his stealth mode, appearing between his three 
comrades.  "That strange bot carried off Hell Beast.  I fear he is dead.  We 
all saw him fighting KitKat, correct?"

Double Punch nodded as three acknowledgements were received in his audio 
receptors.  "Good.  Then, we must take up our arms, and join a faction that 
is against KitKat.  I suggest the Alliance.  They are by far the strongest 
and more superior.  They are not invincible, but without Hell Beast's 
leadership, we can't defeat them.  And because they ARE against KitKat, we 
will fufill part of Hell Beast's plans, one way or another.

The other Predacons agreed with some clapping and 'whooping'.  

"Let's kick tailgate!" Manterror yelled.  

The four robots began marching at a quick pace for the Middle East.
